price: E, quanto a quem temeu a preeminência de seu Senhor e coibiu a alma das paixões,
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفۡسَ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man khāfa maqāma rabbihi wanahā al-nafsa ʿani al-hawā
